titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2679) to amend title 49, United States Code, to establish the National Motor Carrier Administration in the Department of Transportation, to improve the safety of commercial motor vehicle operators and carriers, to strengthen commercial driver's licenses, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-381, by Mr. Sessions.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2679 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments. The amendment printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-381 shall be considered as adopted. Before consideration of any other amdnement it shall be in order to consider the amendment printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-381, if offered by a Member designated in the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 329.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/13/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2679 (motor carrier safety).
